lines.text: I could run things smoother if people died between 9 to 5
I've never had a seance with a bunch of women!

[Having encountered Paul behaving oddly in a graveyard]
He's got a little weird since his Mother committed suicide!
I'd be weird too if I had Hank Andrews for a Father and, on top of that, when I was a kid, locking me up with dead bodies!
Christie, you've been... highly imaginative since your Father's death!

[barking back]
There was somebody out there... I saw him!... Somebody in a black cape trying to stab me!
